fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to produce 1 sun.
- Use 2 bees to permanently reduce the costs of all sun-costing Plant abilities by 1 sun.
- Use 3 bees to deal an Unstoppable attack to a player. If they're a non-Plant, you pay 1 sun, and if they're a Plant, you produce 5 sun.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
